long_description: The waterproof Ortlieb Downtown QL3 Bike pannier attaches to your rear rack like a normal pannier, but offers the sleek looks of a briefcase and has enough room for a 15 in. laptop. PVC-free fabric made of coated nylon offers waterproof toughness. Extra-wide padded shoulder strap and additional carry handle for comfortable transport. Innovative QL3 mounting system received the Eurobike Award 2010 and features mounting components that can be fixed to any standard rack with a tube diameter 8 - 10mm. Mounting height and angle of the bag are individually adjustable. Edge protectors and base feet protect the rear and bottom to ensure durability. 2 large reflectors and a reflective Ortlieb logo enhance visibility in dim light.
short_description: The waterproof Ortlieb Downtown QL3 Bike pannier attaches to your rear rack like a normal pannier, but offers the sleek looks of a briefcase and has enough room for a 15 in. laptop.
